title: Prior and present experience (TEFC)
creator_credit: Kismet Films and Robert E. Gilbert
brief_description: Uses a field trip to point out the need for careful consideration by the teacher of the often unnoticed differences between backgrounds of both students and teachers. Explains that teachers must co-ordinate and supplement both home and school experiences of students.
